commitMessage:
@@@[CALCITE-1219] Add method SqlOperatorBinding.isOperandLiteral() (Hsuan-Yi Chu)

isOperandLiteral() determines whether an operand is a literal.

Close apache/calcite#222

@@@[CALCITE-2329] Improve rewrite for "constant IN (sub-query)"

Improve and refactor SubQueryRemoveRule.

Add tests for partially-null right-hand side. (Julian Hyde)

Close apache/calcite#700

@@@[CALCITE-4199] Add nullability annotations

The commit includes javadoc updates and refactorings made by Julian Hyde in https://github.com/apache/calcite/pull/2278
